title: A Simple Linear Algebraic Approach to Capture the Dynamics of the Circular Flow of Income. (arXiv:2307.02713v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: This article has one single purpose: introduce a new and simple, yet highly insightful approach to capture, fully and quantitatively, the dynamics of the circular flow of income in economies. The proposed approach relies mostly on basic linear algebraic concepts and has deep implications for the disciplines of economics, physics and econophysics.

translated_title: 一种简单的线性代数方法来捕捉收入循环流动的动态
translated_abstract: 这篇文章的唯一目的是引入一种新的、简单但高度有洞察力的方法，以全面和定量地捕捉经济中收入循环流动的动态。所提出的方法主要依赖于基本的线性代数概念，并对经济学、物理学和经济物理学学科具有深远的影响。
tldr: 这篇论文介绍了一种新的简单方法，使用基本的线性代数概念全面且定量地捕捉经济中收入循环流动的动态，对经济学、物理学和经济物理学学科具有深远的影响。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a new and simple approach that uses basic linear algebraic concepts to fully and quantitatively capture the dynamics of the circular flow of income in economies, with profound implications for the disciplines of economics, physics, and econophysics.
